Class ValidationConfiguration

public class ValidationConfiguration
extends TaskConfiguration

Describes the parameters for a classification validation task

Constructor Detail

ValidationConfiguration

public ValidationConfiguration(java.lang.String validationAlgorithmDescription,
                               MetricTable metrics,
                               java.lang.String processedFeaturesModelName,
                               java.lang.String classificationAlgorithmDescription,
                               DataInputInterface inputToValidate,
                               ValidationConfiguration.GroundTruthSourceType groundTruthSourceType)
Standard constructor

Parameters:
validationAlgorithmDescription - ID and parameters of validation method
metrics - Metric list, e.g. containing accuracy and precision
processedFeaturesModelName - Description of methods used for feature processing
classificationAlgorithmDescription - ID of classification algorithm from classifierTable.arff
groundTruthSource - Source with input to validate. Can be either - Id of the music category from $AMUSECATEGORYDATABASE$/categoryTable.arff or - Path to the labeled file list or - Path to the ready labeled input - Ready input (as EditableDataSet)
groundTruthSourceType - Describes the source type of ground truth
